ygData.subject: Re: A clue about the fishing pole?
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried it, but nothing happened, just the usual thank you type message. However, if you accuse the thief of stealing the pole, he responds.  I don t know
ygData.messageBody:
I tried it, but nothing happened, just the usual "thank you" type message.
However, if you accuse the thief of stealing the pole, he responds. I don't
know where the quest leads, though.

Tinik

----- Original Message -----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 06, 1999 11:38 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] A clue about the fishing pole?


> From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
> Here's something that crossed my mind. Not sure where it may lead, but
here
> goes. In Freeport by the docks, there's a female NPC who has her extra
> fishing pole stolen while she's there fishing. Perhaps if someone were to
> give her a fishing pole?
>
